sentence: great views from our balcony lovely pools
Balconies are spacious and either opens up to the pool area or ocean front
The Hilton Suites for guests has its own pool breakfast and high tea restaurant
We had fun in the swimming pools the breakfast was excellent
Pools gorgeous sparkling pools with plenty of lounge chairs towels and space for everyone
The rooms are very nice and the swimming pool is good alternative to the beach which is not the best
The pools at this property are fantastic and the variety of dining options are good
The beach pool restaurants etc
Both the main pool and lagoon pool offered ample sunbed space whilst the lagoon room also offered us a private terrace with sunbeds
The breakfast spread is good and is by the pool at the Japanese restaurant
We spent 2 hours in the Spa and another hour just lapping up the pool and tranquillity of the facilities
Lobby Travel desks many bars and pools will keep you busy

great pools we stayed when work was being done to one area of the hotel but they did extremely well to limit the noise and views of the building work so it did n’t impact our holiday very much awesome 24 hour large gym facility free shuttle bus to local shopping mall the log cabins beds over looking the beach for day rental were great and not expensive considering the free food and drinks vouchers included in the price comfortable hotel rooms but need updating especially the bathroom facilitiesve ongoing work needs a proper bar area for the evening although think this was probably not open due to the building work bathroom facilities need updating electric plugs not working bathroom cleanliness could be better some restaurant staff ca n’t speak basic English
We found it perfect as it was so really looking forward to seeing it after the completion of renovations and see the more of extensive grounds and lagoon pools
While the spa pool was very very nice it is a shame that such a luxurious hotel only had one pool available for most guests
For the suites the pool was peaceful and never crowded and I never heard any of the conduction work
We were brought water and refreshments while at the pol totally awesome during the heat
Pool at spa quiet and nice beach great but a bit windy
Renovation in the main pool
Suites are very large and pleasant but there is a need to ensure everything worksdisturbing to be woken by people swimming and yelling in the pool at 3am
This area was reserved to those 12 years and older however on some days children who were clearly under12 were allowed in the pool and not asked to leave
The rooms were refurbishment but the pool was cloudy
It is only ok to swim when the tide is high which might be a problem for someone but we have still enjoyed the nice clear and calm water
At the lobby you can see pools and beach from above
you really do get swamped with gasoline fumes not just the beach but at the pool can not open balcony door sicking
The room that we were eventually moved to 5 hours later was a Conrad Pool Suite
if I will go to Bali again I am going to choose to stay at Conradthe beach is not perfect for swimming so they need to clean it from rocks and seaweeds to be more suitable for swimming
My suite overlooked the pool and ocean
Pool is big but boring no daily water sports like other places we have been to
Our room 213 was ocean front but we also overlooked one of the many pools on the property
